world,"},{"lineNumber":70487,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当にマニアだけが使っていた頃の","translatedEnglishLine":"back when computers were used only by real enthusiasts,"},{"lineNumber":70488,"originalJapaneseLine":"　コンピューターって感じかしら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"that's what computers feel like here."},{"lineNumber":70489,"originalJapaneseLine":"「コンピューター周りの説明は","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s a rough explanation about world,"},{"lineNumber":70496,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あなたの知ってるそれとは違って、","translatedEnglishLine":"is different from the one you know,"},{"lineNumber":70497,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちょーっと面白いぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"and is a little bit interesting!"},{"lineNumber":70498,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まず、簡単に言うと、","translatedEnglishLine":"First, simply put,"},{"lineNumber":70499,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この世界の海ってのは十年に一度だけに","translatedEnglishLine":"the sea in this world appears only once every ten years."},{"lineNumber":70500,"originalJapaneseLine":"　現れる謎の存在ということ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s a mysterious entity that appears."},{"lineNumber":70501,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大陸の端にドバーッと海がせり上がっていく光景は","translatedEnglishLine":"The sight of the sea rushing up to the edge of the continent"},{"lineNumber":70502,"originalJapaneseLine":"　中々、感動的なものがあるわよねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"is quite an impressive thing to see."},{"lineNumber":70503,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちなみに画像左下の海に行ったシーン、","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, the scene going to the sea at the bottom left of the image,"},{"lineNumber":70504,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これはちょっと前の姿なんだけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"is a somewhat earlier appearance..."},{"lineNumber":70505,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この場所はシナ海という、世界唯一、","translatedEnglishLine":"This place is called the Shina Sea, the world’s only,"},{"lineNumber":70506,"originalJapaneseLine":"　満ち潮とは関係なしに存在し続ける海ね」","translatedEnglishLine":"sea that exists regardless of the tidal changes."},{"lineNumber":70507,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当本当。","translatedEnglishLine":"Really, really."},{"lineNumber":70508,"originalJapaneseLine":"　クエスト説明文でシナ海って言ってるから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Since the quest description says Shina Sea,"},{"lineNumber":70509,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うそくさーって思ったあなたは見てみろりん","translatedEnglishLine":"if you thought \"sounds fishy,\" just take a look."},{"lineNumber":70510,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さて、今回はミンクス船団の話しましょっか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now then, this time let's talk about the Minx fleet."},{"lineNumber":70511,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ヘルマンが国家として全盛期だった頃、","translatedEnglishLine":"When Helman was at its peak as a nation,"},{"lineNumber":70512,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ミンクスという貴族さんが国の秘宝を持ち出し、","translatedEnglishLine":"a noble named Minx took out the nation’s secret treasures,"},{"lineNumber":70513,"originalJapaneseLine":"　17隻の船に乗せて逃げたんですって」","translatedEnglishLine":"loaded them onto seventeen ships and escaped."},{"lineNumber":70514,"originalJapaneseLine":"「その秘宝の数は、","translatedEnglishLine":"The number of those treasures"},{"lineNumber":70515,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんとヘルマン国の財宝の半分ほど。","translatedEnglishLine":"was about half of Helman’s entire wealth."},{"lineNumber":70516,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それはもう大事件だったそうよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It was really a major incident."},{"lineNumber":70517,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そして、彼らが海に出て消息は完全に途絶え、","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, after they went out to sea, their whereabouts were completely lost,"},{"lineNumber":70518,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ヘルマンも諦めきった15年後、","translatedEnglishLine":"and fifteen years later, when Helman had completely given up,"},{"lineNumber":70519,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんとミンクス船団の一隻が姿を現したわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"one of the Minx fleet's ships appeared."},{"lineNumber":70520,"originalJapaneseLine":"「シベリアの氷雪地帯に、","translatedEnglishLine":"It was in the icy snowy region of Siberia,"},{"lineNumber":70521,"originalJapaneseLine":"　空から降ってくるって形でね」","translatedEnglishLine":"falling from the sky like form."},{"lineNumber":70522,"originalJapaneseLine":"「残りもどこかに落ちているのではと、","translatedEnglishLine":"Thinking the rest might have fallen somewhere,"},{"lineNumber":70523,"originalJapaneseLine":"　消えたミンクス船団捜索が行われたけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"a search for the disappeared Minx fleet was carried out,"},{"lineNumber":70524,"originalJapaneseLine":"　残りは未だ見つかっていないそうよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"but the rest have yet to be found."},{"lineNumber":70525,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うーん、なんとも世界の不思議なお話」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, what a mysterious story of the world."},{"lineNumber":70526,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ついでにもう一つ」","translatedEnglishLine":"While we're at it, one more thing."},{"lineNumber":70527,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こちらはナイチサ期。","translatedEnglishLine":"This is the Naitisa era."},{"lineNumber":70528,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世界をほぼ制服したものの","translatedEnglishLine":"Though almost the entire world was subdued,"},{"lineNumber":70529,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ナイチサに殺された藤原石丸さん」","translatedEnglishLine":"Mr. Ishimaru Fujiwara, who was killed by Naitisa."},{"lineNumber":70530,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――の、親族さん達は、壇ノ浦と呼ばれる","translatedEnglishLine":"-- his relatives are called Dan-no-ura"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の足だけが頼りのストーキングだったから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I was relying entirely on my own feet for stalking,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それからはもう……本当に、楽で、楽で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from then on... it was truly easy, so easy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私とコンピューターの手にかかれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's in the hands of me and the computer,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 秘匿事項のリーザスやゼスの事件も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even the confidential incidents of Leazas and Zeth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぜーんぶ知ることが出来たわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was able to know everything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ビバ、コンピューター！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Viva, computer!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ありがとう、コンピューター！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thank you, computer!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみにコンピューターは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, computers are

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 便利なものではあるんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: convenient tools, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「コンピューター使えるだけで商売開ける程度には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just being able to use a computer is enough to start a business,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの世界と違って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: unlike your world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっとも一般普及してないのよねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they’re not widespread at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに利便性も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And as for convenience,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一部の才能ある人以外にとっては
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: except for a few talented people,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決していいというほどでもないので……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's not necessarily very good...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あなたの世界で言う、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's like in your world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にマニアだけが使っていた頃の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: back when computers were used only by real enthusiasts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピューターって感じかしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's what computers feel like here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「コンピューター周りの説明は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s a rough explanation about computers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ざっとこんな感じかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: something like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、ネクスト図鑑で！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, onto the next encyclopedia!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーーーーーみーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seaaaaaaa!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、ほいさっさ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so, here we go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回は海のお話！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time it’s a story about the sea!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この世界の海は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sea in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの知ってるそれとは違って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is different from the one you know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょーっと面白いぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and is a little bit interesting!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず、簡単に言うと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First, simply put,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界の海ってのは十年に一度だけに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the sea in this world appears only once every ten years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現れる謎の存在ということ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s a mysterious entity that appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大陸の端にドバーッと海がせり上がっていく光景は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sight of the sea rushing up to the edge of the continent

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中々、感動的なものがあるわよねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is quite an impressive thing to see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに画像左下の海に行ったシーン、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, the scene going to the sea at the bottom left of the image,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはちょっと前の姿なんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is a somewhat earlier appearance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この場所はシナ海という、世界唯一、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This place is called the Shina Sea, the world’s only,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満ち潮とは関係なしに存在し続ける海ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sea that exists regardless of the tidal changes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当本当。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Really, really.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエスト説明文でシナ海って言ってるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the quest description says Shina Sea,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うそくさーって思ったあなたは見てみろりん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you thought "sounds fishy," just take a look.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、今回はミンクス船団の話しましょっか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, this time let's talk about the Minx fleet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヘルマンが国家として全盛期だった頃、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Helman was at its peak as a nation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミンクスという貴族さんが国の秘宝を持ち出し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a noble named Minx took out the nation’s secret treasures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 17隻の船に乗せて逃げたんですって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: loaded them onto seventeen ships and escaped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その秘宝の数は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The number of those treasures

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとヘルマン国の財宝の半分ほど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was about half of Helman’s entire wealth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはもう大事件だったそうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was really a major incident.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、彼らが海に出て消息は完全に途絶え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, after they went out to sea, their whereabouts were completely lost,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンも諦めきった15年後、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and fifteen years later, when Helman had completely given up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとミンクス船団の一隻が姿を現したわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: one of the Minx fleet's ships appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シベリアの氷雪地帯に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was in the icy snowy region of Siberia,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空から降ってくるって形でね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: falling from the sky like form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「残りもどこかに落ちているのではと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thinking the rest might have fallen somewhere,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 消えたミンクス船団捜索が行われたけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a search for the disappeared Minx fleet was carried out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残りは未だ見つかっていないそうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the rest have yet to be found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、なんとも世界の不思議なお話」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, what a mysterious story of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ついでにもう一つ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While we're at it, one more thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらはナイチサ期。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the Naitisa era.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界をほぼ制服したものの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though almost the entire world was subdued,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナイチサに殺された藤原石丸さん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mr. Ishimaru Fujiwara, who was killed by Naitisa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――の、親族さん達は、壇ノ浦と呼ばれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: -- his relatives are called Dan-no-ura

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の足だけが頼りのストーキングだったから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I was relying entirely on my own feet for stalking,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それからはもう……本当に、楽で、楽で……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from then on... it was truly easy, so easy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私とコンピューターの手にかかれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's in the hands of me and the computer,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 秘匿事項のリーザスやゼスの事件も、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even the confidential incidents of Leazas and Zeth,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぜーんぶ知ることが出来たわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was able to know everything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ビバ、コンピューター！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Viva, computer!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ありがとう、コンピューター！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thank you, computer!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみにコンピューターは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, computers are

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 便利なものではあるんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: convenient tools, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「コンピューター使えるだけで商売開ける程度には、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just being able to use a computer is enough to start a business,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの世界と違って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: unlike your world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっとも一般普及してないのよねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they’re not widespread at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それに利便性も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And as for convenience,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一部の才能ある人以外にとっては
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: except for a few talented people,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 決していいというほどでもないので……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's not necessarily very good...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あなたの世界で言う、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's like in your world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当にマニアだけが使っていた頃の
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: back when computers were used only by real enthusiasts,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コンピューターって感じかしら？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's what computers feel like here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「コンピューター周りの説明は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s a rough explanation about computers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ざっとこんな感じかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: something like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「では、ネクスト図鑑で！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, onto the next encyclopedia!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーーーーーみーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seaaaaaaa!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というわけで、ほいさっさ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so, here we go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回は海のお話！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time it’s a story about the sea!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この世界の海は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sea in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたの知ってるそれとは違って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is different from the one you know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょーっと面白いぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and is a little bit interesting!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まず、簡単に言うと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: First, simply put,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界の海ってのは十年に一度だけに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the sea in this world appears only once every ten years.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 現れる謎の存在ということ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s a mysterious entity that appears.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大陸の端にドバーッと海がせり上がっていく光景は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sight of the sea rushing up to the edge of the continent

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中々、感動的なものがあるわよねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is quite an impressive thing to see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ちなみに画像左下の海に行ったシーン、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, the scene going to the sea at the bottom left of the image,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これはちょっと前の姿なんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is a somewhat earlier appearance...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この場所はシナ海という、世界唯一、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This place is called the Shina Sea, the world’s only,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満ち潮とは関係なしに存在し続ける海ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sea that exists regardless of the tidal changes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当本当。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Really, really.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クエスト説明文でシナ海って言ってるから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since the quest description says Shina Sea,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うそくさーって思ったあなたは見てみろりん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if you thought "sounds fishy," just take a look.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、今回はミンクス船団の話しましょっか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, this time let's talk about the Minx fleet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ヘルマンが国家として全盛期だった頃、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Helman was at its peak as a nation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミンクスという貴族さんが国の秘宝を持ち出し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a noble named Minx took out the nation’s secret treasures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 17隻の船に乗せて逃げたんですって」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: loaded them onto seventeen ships and escaped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その秘宝の数は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The number of those treasures

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとヘルマン国の財宝の半分ほど。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was about half of Helman’s entire wealth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはもう大事件だったそうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was really a major incident.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、彼らが海に出て消息は完全に途絶え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, after they went out to sea, their whereabouts were completely lost,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンも諦めきった15年後、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and fifteen years later, when Helman had completely given up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとミンクス船団の一隻が姿を現したわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: one of the Minx fleet's ships appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シベリアの氷雪地帯に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was in the icy snowy region of Siberia,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空から降ってくるって形でね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: falling from the sky like form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「残りもどこかに落ちているのではと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thinking the rest might have fallen somewhere,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 消えたミンクス船団捜索が行われたけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a search for the disappeared Minx fleet was carried out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残りは未だ見つかっていないそうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the rest have yet to be found.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーん、なんとも世界の不思議なお話」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, what a mysterious story of the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ついでにもう一つ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While we're at it, one more thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらはナイチサ期。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the Naitisa era.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界をほぼ制服したものの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though almost the entire world was subdued,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ナイチサに殺された藤原石丸さん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mr. Ishimaru Fujiwara, who was killed by Naitisa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――の、親族さん達は、壇ノ浦と呼ばれる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: -- his relatives are called Dan-no-ura
